issue.title: [Archery] Ensure benchmark clone accepts remotes in revision
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5781](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5781). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Found that ursabot would always compare the PR tip commit with itself via https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4739#issuecomment-506819250 . This is due to buildbot github behavior of using a git-reset --hard local that changes the `master` rev to this new state.
